name: Work In Progress (WiP Gamelab)
description:
TRAVEL THROUGH A STILL-IN-DEVELOPMENT COMIC BOOK!

Walk in the shoes of Sketch the Rat in this adventure being built as you progress the levels! 

Work in Progress is a 2D sidescroller action platformer set in the roots of comic books and artist fans alike! Progress through the city, roam in the mysterious factory, while avoiding the AniMafia, a no-good animal mafia set to conquer the whole comic book world! 

Help the Artist complete his story! Think you got what it takes?

  • A 2d Single-player experience that builds up the art as you progress through the levels;
  • Defeat the roaming mafia cats and avoid the other enemies by jumping, sliding, running or crouching;
  • Discover scrapped content that may or may not be possessed;

Currently the game is in early access, so this game will be receiving major updates, later in the future! This game was first made for the Politechnical Institute of Leiria as a 2D Game project in our Videogames & Multimedia course!

Our team:

  • Game Artist: Fábio Matias
  • Game Programmer: Stefano Dobbin
